{{Character | character name = The Zoo Employee
(real name unknown) | image = [[Image:ZooEmployee.jpg|200px]] | gender = Male | ep = [[The One After The Superbowl, Part 1]] | occ = Zoo Janitor | actor = [[Dan Castellaneta]] }} '''The Zoo Employee''' is a janitor at the San Diego Zoo, portrayed by [[Dan Castellaneta]] in "[[The One After The Superbowl, Part 1]]". He informs [[Ross Geller|Ross]] about the real whereabouts of [[Marcel]], after the [[Dean Lipson|zoo administrator]] told Ross that he had died. The Zoo Employee is an odd man with a strange fascination for the animals in the zoo. He tells Ross that there was a break-in and Marcel was taken (along with a snowy egret, a two-toed sloth, and three hooded sweatshirts from the zoo gift shop) and that the story told to Ross is a big cover up because the zoo wants to avoid bad publicity. He tells Ross that the cover-up goes very high up, but is shocked to learn that Lipson knows. His initial plan is to get Ross to bribe him, but he tells Ross everything he knows too soon, thus failing. [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Season 2 Characters]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Characters]]
